attributes.action: bring a bill before parliament on calling a referendum on the matter of further changing the composition of the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No matter is more fundamental to a people than the way in which we are governed, the social contract between citizens and the organs of the state. On a matter as fundamental as significant change to the House of Lords. We, the people, should be consulted through referenda.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
